Committee: Veterans, Homeland Security And Military Affairs

Milestones.Committee: Veterans, Homeland Security And Military Affairs

Actions.Text: REFERRED TO VETERANS, HOMELAND SECURITY AND MILITARY AFFAIRS

Title: Exempts military members on active duty who reside in NYC from the payment of E-ZPass tolls
Summary: Exempts military members on active duty who reside in NYC from the payment of E-ZPass tolls for travel within the state.
LawCode: Amd ยง2855, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to exempting active duty military members who reside in a city with a population of one million or more from E-ZPass tolls
